content.detailedDescription:
The first object is in my jaw, small triangle. 2nd is in the neck area, just below the base of the skull,a rectangular rod, 3rd is between the hip and tail bones of the spine, a skull shaped object. i did not notice these until i pursued more chiropractic care. i happened to glance at them, and noticed the object in the largest x-ray of my spine. (these objects can not be buttons-the doctor had me remove my pants to the knees, and you can clearly see the metal on the back of my bra versus the object.) 
i had always had strange dreams, and even met particular people from these dreams. i've experienced missing time, but have had no specific memories of abduction. recently a friend of mine had the same dream as i, and when we compared memories, they were of the same place, surroundings, fears, etc. her family has experienced abductions for many years, and i believe my association with them was not a coincidence. i have included digital pictures of my x-rays, and am trying to obtain more recent x-rays from a local chiropractic office i visited in 2000.
content.summary: This is not a ufo, i am reporting implants that can be viewed on my x-rays.

content.detailedDescription: Hiking around the raptor center in sitka, ak

content.detailedDescription: I was at home testing my new digital camera taking  pics of anything. i took some pics of clouds for fun and never really looked at them until tonight when i was clearing stuff off my hard drive. i dont remember seeing or hearing anything strange. it looks strange to me but it might just be one of those steath aircraft? i dont know why it says am i must not have set the time it was in the afternoon.

content.summary: Red blue white flashing lights, erratic movement, dissapearing and reapearing

content.detailedDescription: At about 1400 hours, approximately on the date mentioned, two police officers and a civilian pilot were in a 182 cessna aircraft about 10 miles south of a major northwest airport, operating in the arsa under approach control. the aircraft was in a race track holding pattern oriented north and south about one mile by two miles, at about three thousand feet msl over a freeway. the weather was clear with bright overhead sun, and no wind, smoke in the area was rising almost vertically. visibility and cieling were unlimited. the temperature was mild to warm. other aircraft were in the area but none were in the immediate vicinity. as the two pilots were involved with flying the aircraft, the observer in the back seat was spotting vehicles on the ground practicing techniques to acquire and maintain visual contact with targets on the ground. on the south bound leg, on the eastern most track, the observer saw a round ball like object about two to three feet in diameter with a seamless, mirror like surface tucked into the four o'clock position, relative to , and keeping pace with, the aircraft, about two hundred feet out and about three to five hundred feet below. there was no visible means of propulsion, and no light sources. the only reason it was visible was the contrast of the shiny object to the dark ground. the object was seen to follow the aircraft through a ninety degree turn to the west, then a ninety degree turn to the north. it continued in it's relative position, flying formation with the aircraft, on around to the southbound leg. this period of observation was made by the observer alone who did not notify the pilots, not wanting to be ridiculed. towards the end of the southbound leg the right seat pilot observed the object idependently and without being advised by the observer. upon being asked the observer then advised that he too saw the object. the left seat pilot could not see the object as it was tucked in too close to the right side of the aircraft. as the scheduled turn to the west was made the left seat pilot made an unusually steep bank and it was at that time he too saw the object. the observer asked about the possibility that the object was a mylar type silver ballon. it was pointed out that it was a virtually windless day and further that the indicated airspeed was about 75 knots and the object was maintaining it's position and turning with the aircraft. approach control was quiried as to the presence of any possible radar contacts in the immediate vicinity. the reply was negative. although there was no direct question as to what was being observed the controller asked the aproximate range from our aircraft to the contact and was advised within one quarter mile. there was a standy order then an advisory that there were no contacts in the area, and then , "did we wish to make a report". the left seat pilot did not think anyone would believe the incident, and that it would not be worth the trouble. the right seat pilot was a low time pilot and was concerned about possible sanctions against his license to fly. the observer went along with both pilots who decision was made not to report. the observation continued and an inquiry was made to the ground units by the observer if they could see anything in the proximity of the aircraft. the reply was negative, and when asked by ground units if we were watching a ufo the reply was, "as a matter of fact yes we are". there was no confirmation from the ground. then as the aircraft turned onto the northbound leg the object suddenly, and very smoothly accelerated out in front of the aircaft at about the same altitude. it covered the distance of about two miles in about two to three seconds accelerating from about seventy five knots. the object the executed a ninety degree right turn to the east, after a radical deceleration as the turn was made. this maneuver can be best described as the object displaying the characteristics of a 50 cal. tracer round fired from the aircraft. as the turn to the east was completed there was again a display of acceleration that was almost unbelievable. again the analogy of a 50 cal. tracer round is consistant with the flight characteristics of the object. the acceleration, a ballistic curve, and the speed were all about what one could expect when observing a projectile being fired from that type of weapon. the object was seen to enter the trees on the northwest shoulder of a mountain to the east, appearing to have crashed. that observation was made by one of the pilots. the observer was instructed to fix the exact location of possible impact while the pilots flew a north, northwesterly course from the southwest corner of the pattern intending to overfly and positively fix the location for ground investigation. as the aircraft approached to within about a mile to a mile and half of the possible point of impact, the object flew upwards out of the trees at about a twenty five to thirty degree angle to an approximate altitude of five thousand msl. the accelleration again was extremely fast and smooth, but as the object leveled out on a southerly course it, as rapidly, decelerated to a more liesurely pace, about one or two hundred knots. the object continued on this course for about thirty seconds to a minute when it executed a left turn, about forty fivr degrees to the south southeast and accelerated away at an astonishing rate dissappearing from sight in a very short time. a similar object was seen at a later time in an area to the southwest of the original incident displaying similar characteristics, such as altitude, speed, and last know direction of travel, to the south southeast at a high rate of speed. this information came about as a television show of video recorded sightings was on. the wife pointed out one of the objects, a silver ball, and mentioned her observations. she was unaware of the similarities of the two incidents at the time of the conversation. the pilot of the plane is an expierienced high time civilian pilot. the copilot is a low time licensed pilot and is a police officer with about fifteen years expierience. the observer is a twenty year police officer with some expierience flying and is a military veteran. both officers are still employed and the two pilots continue to fly.
content.summary: Ufo followed light aircraft from below and behind at close range

content.detailedDescription:
I check the newspaper in my hometown and i noticed the picture today about this elderly fellow that had built a model of something he saw... i noticed the orange lights and thought maybe his info could link to the incidents in northern indiana last april.  folks in this area are quite friendly, and i think he would be willing to talk...
if link doesn't show his picture then you'll have to check their archive or try to see thier e-edition...

www.Tmnews.Com

huron -- phillip king used some gutter screen, a few dozen reflectors, two satellite dishes, four mobile home foundation legs and some other bits and pieces to create a replica of what he says he saw flying over u.S. 50
content.summary: See picture at link

content.detailedDescription: I was in my house when i heard a jet that was obviously not a commercial jet rather a millatery sounding jet,so i went outside to look.I spotted the milletary jet shoot something at something leaving some kind of vaper trails or rocket trails of white smoke. then the milletary jet escorted another airplaine out of my sight.
content.summary: Millitary  jet shooting something at a smaller plane over twords pomona airspace.Then escorted plane westward >

content.detailedDescription: I was on vacation in greece visiting friends and we were coming back from a small village in the mountains. as we drove, i asked my friends to stop numerous times to get photos of the incredible scenery. during one of the stops, we noticed strange lights moving around in the mountain valley. at first they were faint, but then appeared to zoom down into the valley before making a sharp left hand turn and shooting up. they hovered for a moment and appeared to be four balls of light and then they disappeared. we continued to drive and a short while later, i noticed a very faint trainge shape of lights in the daytime sky. i also took a photo of this.
content.summary: Bright lights in mountain valley

content.detailedDescription: I     looked out my kitchen window for some reason and to my left in the sky was a large, bright "headlight" in the sky. it looked like a headlight from a car.I watched for a while to see any changes because i wanted to see if it was a helicopter. i went outside with my friend who lives with me. we both watched and filmed it with a video recorder. i have a copy and would like to send it for analysis. it looked about the size of an oncoming car headlight. it had no sound. dogs were barking,but it was unusually quiet. it was very cold that night and we couldn't stay out very long.It appeared to look like a sphere.It looked like it was spinning and would stop and aimed it's light like a big eyeball. that's what i remember most. it reminded me of an eyeball observing. at times it aimed left, then straight ahead. it then "looked" right and turned completely away. that's when you could see it's sphere shape. afterward i felt disturbed and there was alot of static electricity in the air. i felt like i was being watched. we went inside to warm up. we went back out about ten minutes later and it had moved considerably away towards the west.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw a large bright  "headlight" in the sky. i went outside with my friend to film it.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home rolling up the widows in my jeep. i was sitting in the seat looking aout the sun roof at the moon. i noticed that the moon was out early and it was full. when i fist saw it i thought that maybe it was some sort of rocket. it was heading right toward the moon.  i went from left to right in the sky. it moved very slow at first and i was wondering if it was possable to see a rocket or ship heading towards the moon with the naked eye. it got faster as it passed by the moon in the sky.  i realized it was not a rocket or a ship of any kind. it stopped as it got passed the moon and stood still. i was still tring to figure out what it was. it stayed on one spot for a good 2-3 mins and the it shot off at a high rate of speed to the right.
content.summary: Bright white cigar shaped

content.detailedDescription: I was at home rolling up the widows in my jeep. i was sitting in the seat looking aout the sun roof at the moon. i noticed that the moon was out early and it was full. when i fist saw it i thought that maybe it was some sort of rocket. it was heading right toward the moon.  i went from left to right in the sky. it moved very slow at first and i was wondering if it was possable to see a rocket or ship heading towards the moon with the naked eye. it got faster as it passed by the moon in the sky.  i realized it was not a rocket or a ship of any kind. it stopped as it got passed the moon and stood still. i was still tring to figure out what it was. it stayed on one spot for a good 2-3 mins and the it shot off at a high rate of speed to the right.
content.summary: Bright white cigar shaped

content.detailedDescription: I was riding my harley and i saw what i thougt was a plane crash in a farm field. i parked it and walked over. i saw it come out it looked like bigfoot . i peed my pants. it then ran into palmetto bushes. and i lost sight of it. i didnt see the ship it was in
content.summary: Ahairy ape

content.detailedDescription: One day i was outside looking at the sky. it was moderate temperature, and there wasn't a cloud in the sky. when i was looking down again, i heard a sonic boom. i looked up and saw a plane flying overhead, and dismissed it at that. when i looked down again, what i didn't notice before, was a huge cylindar shaped craft, flying very low seemingly over a school a few houses up the street from where i live. i was glued to the spot, and took in every detail. at first i thought it was a top secret military craft or something of the sort, but the governmet wouldn't fly that over a city. it appeared to be about a block or so long, and about 1/2 tall and wide. the craft was completely convered in metal with many wires overalping the metal sheets connecting the entire outside of the craft with wires. some parts of it were rusted, and it looked very travel worn. it looked like it was made out of the exact same material as the death star in star wars. i looked for any openings for the pilot, but found none. when it started moving away, i saw that the entire backside was just a huge fan (about 1/2 block tall and wide, the size of the craft. it seemed to be about 50 feet above the ground. the craft was totaly cylindrical, and it was traveling horizantaly, not vertically. it was moving slowly, taking a few minutes to travel a short distance, but all the while i was hearing a sonic boom, so it must have been traveling very fast. by this time the first plane that i saw was gone, so it couldn't have been that. when it started moving out of my field of vision, i went as fast as i could to the front of the house to see it better. even though it took so long to travel such a short distance, by the time i was at the front it was gone. i could not hear anything for a few seconds at that point. the birds even were not chirping, it was as if the world was on mute. i knew i could still hear because i could hear myself breathing. after a few seconds i was able to hear everything again, and everything seemed back to normal. i am the only person that i know that saw this or something like it.
content.summary: Large cylindar, looked worn out, almost like out of star wars

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the front porch. it was a very clear night. i allways watch the sky. i am very interested in ufo's. i saw 2 airplains with red, blue, and white flashing lights going by and as i was watching the planes i saw a small ball of light it moved across the sky faster than the airplanes were traveling, but not fast like a shooting star it was definatly no plane. it moved across the sky in a very steady path. i then noticed 3 more of the airplanes. it was allmost as if they were patrolling the ball of light not following it.The next evening my boyfriend and  i wittnesed the same thing but the ball of light came from a different direction i had seen it fly by virticly this time it came over the house horazontaly.We watched it untill it was out of sight and once it was gone so were the airplanes.When we saw it my boyfriend said he was not sure what it was. i knew i was seeing something that was no plane,star, or sattelite. 
i am currious if you have had any other reports in my area?

I was wondering if anyone from maine has ever reported an angel type ufo?
my husband,myself and 2 of our buddies were up in the northern part of maine bear hunting and as we sat at camp one evening this light form came down and
stopped above us.It was the most beautiful but eerie sight we had ever seen!! it looked just like an angel with wings and then we watched it rise back up until it finally disappeared.I tried taking a picture but my camera
would not work..Ugh!
content.summary: Beautiful but eerie

content.detailedDescription:
"me, my wife, my brother in-law and my young daughter of 3 years old were headed to salem oregon on a highway 15 miles just east of salem. there were clouds in the sky in three different layers but no rain. as i was driving west i noticed through my perifial vision to my left that there was a large dark spot in the sky so i looked to my left and saw a large object floating about 30 feet off the ground! i yelled and emediantly slowed down the car and did a quick u turn and pulled over to the south side of the highway, got out of the car and looked very clearly at this thing! everyone in the car got out and asked what was wrong and i told them to look up over there and they gasped! this was an object with the exact demensions of a hocky puck in that it was flat on top, flat on the bottom and round on the edges. it was flat black and not shiny. it had no windows, no lights and made no sound. i noticed that the trees and shrubs just beneath it were not being disturbed in any way. also under this object was the county jail facility or some sort of correctional facility and there was a gaurd in one of the towers. we yelled at him to look up but he just looked at us. he and the facility were about 75 yards from the highway. this object was about 80 to 100 yards in diameter and was just so massive that i could hardly believe it even though i stood there looking at it! i could have easily thrown a rock at it and struck it. it was just floating there 30 feet off the ground and it was tilted at a 45 degree angle and it was that way for about 2 minuts or so then it began to move which sent all of us to hide behind the other side of the car. it titled over to its other side at 45 degrees and remained there for about another 3 minuts. this allowed us to see the roof of the object which was as flat and smooth as its underside. it really looked like a giant hocky puck and was flat black. it then tilted again to the other side for about 10 seconds and then slowly began to move westward at a 30 degree climb angle at about 40 mph. we got back into the car and u-turned to head west to follow it. it then picked up great speed and by that time i was already pegging 90 mph in persuit. just then a police car passed us with his cherries fully lit but no siren and i never even noticed that he was behind us. he passed us like we were sitting still and we all assumed that he was chasing this thing as well.
 
if that was not bizarre enough what happened next was even more unbelievable. we lost site of this object in the low dark grey clouds but passed by an air national gaurd station about 5 miles east of salem. i u-turned again and went back to that station, got out of my car with my brother in-law and we told the gaurds there what had just happened. they were totally unconcerned! i wanted to speak to their radar operater but they refused to allow me on the base. after about 5 minuts of argueing, i had enough so i simply pushed one of them aside and ran for the building that i thought may have the radar in it. they tackeled me and put my arms behind my back and led me back to the gate. they threatened me that i was guilty of a federal crime by "breaking into a federal facility" and would be arested if i didn't leave. we got into our car and left there headed for salem again. we didn't see the police car or the ufo anymore.
 
we then arrived at our relatives house in salem and told them what had happened. to my amazement they chuckeled and said that they could tell that we were newcomers to oregon. i asked how. she said that they see them all the time! two days later at the vetenarian clinic while getting our dog a shot i told the vet what had happened. to my amaizment he too stated that this is a common occurance in and around salem! i heard this again from a store clerk and a parking attendant who states that on two seperate occations he personally spotted a ufo stuck to the side of one of the mountains east of salem. so if there are so many sightings why then aren't ufoligists going there to film these on a regular basis?
 
one thing is for sure, since that time on that highway my life has changed forever in that i am now obsessed with these crafts. i have dedicated all my spare and free time to understanding how these crafts fly, how their propulsion systems work and what intelligent race of beings fly them and why do they never come down to earth and land in the middle of a major traffic intersection and begin a dialog with us. this would block our govt's effort to convince us that what we see is swamp gas comming from the planet venus."
content.summary: Event was a close encounter. object was hockey puck shaped about 75 yards in diameter. i was within 70 yards of craft.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking random photographs from my property of a light cloudy area and discovered the ufo when i downloaded the picture in my computer. in the first photo the object is a little left of the center of the picture. this shot has not been altered in any way. the second photo is an enlargement of the object done from the first photo.
content.summary: Random photograph taken from my property

content.detailedDescription: I was taking random photographs from my property of a chemtrail and discovered the ufo when i downloaded the picture in my computer. in the first photo the object is in the upper left of the picture and the chemtrail is very dim. this shot has not been altered in any way. the second photo is an enlargement of the object done from the first photo.
content.summary: Random photograph  taken from my property

content.detailedDescription: Took a picture with digital camera and when i downloaded to the pc i saw the triangular shape object.When i took the picture i did not noticed the object.
content.summary: Did not see it. when i downloaded the picture to the pc i saw the triangular shape

content.detailedDescription: My roomate took the trash out to the curb and saw the lights. came in and woke me up. we went out and looked at ufo with binoculars, then i used my digital video camera to get low grade video. the ufo seemed to be stationary then moved very slowlt to the south east. a small private plane flew by in a different part of sky. the ufo is definately not a plane or blimp ! the ufo was in sight for 30 min. it slowly moved out of sight. icould make out the seperate lights when i first saw the object. then they merged into a single speck the farther away it moved.
content.summary: Multi colored lights, red, green, blue,white pulsating and moving south east very slowly and very high

content.detailedDescription: I was backpacking with a friend in the great gulf wilderness near lonsome lake just north of mt washington, nh. we where 2 days into a 4 day trip and where laying in our sleping bags looking up at the stars, we had no tent. we both noticed a shooting star that looked as though it would hit the north side of mt washington, just before it would hit the light swerved 270 degrees and disappeared. the tree line we where camped at had trees about 10' tall, and withing 5 seconds, a light was visible over the tree line, there was also a high frequncy humming noise that was increasing in pitch as the light got closer, (a doppler effect)the light passed directly over our heads, i recall being frozen in fear, the light resembled a round glowing ring on a dark mass,  i stared straight ahead and talked calmy with my friend about what we had seen. i tried to stay awake and remember waking up in the morning and not talking too much about what had happened. we both agreed to discontinue our hike and leave the woods that day. we hiked 11 miles out of the woods and back to our vehicle.

I was about 14 years old travelling on interstate 75 in a car with my mom and her best friend coming back from a week at galveston beach.  they were talking and i was sitting in the back seat, with my two sisters in the rear of the station wagon asleep.  i was sitting up and leaning over the front seat staring out the windshield at the bright stars, hoping to catch a glance of a shooting star.  i saw a very bright blinking light directly above us following the highway and moving in a very fast zig zag fashion.  i pointed it out to my mom and her friend and we watched it for what seemed to be a long time.  the three of us were trying to figure out what it could be and decided it was definately a ufo.  the object ended up travelling much faster than us and it flew off into the night.  we ended up pulling over at a truck stop to see if there were other witnesses, but no one appeared to be talking about it and we certainly didn't bring it up.  it couldn't have been an airplane because there were no red and green flashing lights associated with it.
content.summary: Ufo travelling in a zig zag fashion following i-75 from houston to dallas

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving
the bright flickering light
i thought it was a spotlight of some sort
it flickered it was long and it gave off alot of light but no sound, but a little wind
at first i thought it was a spot light, then i started feeling cold kinda scared, i was still wondering what the hell was wrong with the car. after we were sitting in the car on the side of the road like a mile back from where we came but somehow the car was back on but it was like ice cold inside and i always have the heater on during the winter.
i didnt lose sight of it , it was just gone
ps the paint on the hood was like it went through a sand storm.
content.summary: We were driving and the car started to shut down and we saw an orangish long light

content.detailedDescription: See gallupindependent.Com for reported sighting this past week. the exact link to the sighting report is at http://www.Gallupindependent.Com/2005/august/082305ufo.Html
content.summary: Light in the sky over standing rock, new mexico for 5 nights

content.detailedDescription: I was getting ready for bed and checked the front door.  i saw through the window what i first thought was an extremely bright star.  what caught my eye was that it appeared to be twinkling red and green and white.  it was in the south west sky from my perspective (in a small town along the ohio river).  i looked through binoculars and it seemed to be three very bright red, green and white lights flashing and possibly rotating.  the lights slowly (over 20 to 25 minutes) moved lower toward the horizon and to the right.  my wife and i thought maybe it was a satelite but it seemed much too bright and much too slow.
content.summary: Flashing red, green and white lights

content.detailedDescription: 1.Was at friends home lookingat the stars.2.The brightness of the ship.3.A ufo!4.It moved slow south to north saucer shape with spinning top dome shiney bright silver with high preasure steaming noise.5.I was in total awe!And very excited.6.It moved in same direction behind hill just 100 yards from my cabin.   p.S. i will send a sketch to you.
content.summary: I was looking west ,just a half a mile away ,150 feet above the ground..Between two hills hovering over the matole river swim holebrightly silver saucer ,top was spinning with dark windows,white steam,no noise.400 feet in diam..It was looking at me+i at i

content.detailedDescription:
I am a truck driver and i was coming in from the north through hopkinsville on 41.  not yet to hopkinsville and a bright blast of light got my attention.  two craft traveling very fast from the south in my direction.
they were projecting beams of light to the ground and they were changing colors.
these were not helicopters from ft campbell.
they steaked past me then went up and out of sight.
during the time my truck radio as well as my cb went into noise like a sizzling.
i can't give you information as it would cause a problem with my child custody case.
i am a recovering alcohalic you can publish my sighting just dont send e-mail to my business or make any contact with my ex wife.
i feel it is important to report these things so others can know about them.
thanks tom
content.summary: Two round or saucer shaped objects moving from the north in my direction shining lights on the ground. flash of light.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my daughters father we out at ponte vedra beach, we arrived around 915... as we were sitting on the beach, we noticed a brightly lit object flying at a low altitude ( its lights were reflecting on the water) we watched it fade , disappear, reappear , then 2 more popped up, & do the same thing  etc.. then my fiance at the time, thought he'd flick a lighter at them - to see if they could see us.. funny we thought... but it appeared they were getting closer.. by this time it was about 945 or so.. next thing i know, i feel completely overwhelmed with total fear from head to toe- and was shaking. i started screaming bloody murder an ran off the beach. he followed behind me. we got in the car and it was 12:45 am! 3 hours of my life just disappeared.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Missing time
